### EMAIL: HelloFresh US 2025-W48 Recipe Report
ID: 19b2301668766752
From: "'Rachel LeMier' via Recipe Survey Results" <recipe-survey-results@hellofresh.com>
----------------------------------------

Hi team,





HelloFresh 2025 Week 48 resulted in an overall menu score of 3.46 (-0.04 target

score of 3.50, -0.05 vs planned menu score of 3.51).





CPI Commentary: Scores this week were still impacted by the broccoli

shortage. In addition, Slot 2 Sweet Thai Chili Burgers scored a 3.36 with

several complaints about bland flavor and the quality of the beef.





Please see our full report

<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mVR6C-x_UMmuY9lgn3VC0N-SdEnfhMcwM2eX9sMpse0/edit?gid=389153776#gid=389153776>

for

in-depth WoW views.





Weekly Call-Outs:



   - SKU Launches:

      - Chosen Foods Mayo - 0.42 Ounce (oz) - Brand Partnership - 1 Unit,

      Slot 2

      - Mandarin Oranges, In-Juice - 4 Ounce (oz), Slot 13

   - *Quality*

      - R14 - steak was tough

      - R87 - eggplant was rotten and mushy





Recipe of the Week:



Smoky BBQ Chicken Quesadillas, RS 3.66 and demand 8.2. L3 "So good, super

fast and easy to make. The bbq and the crema flavours together are so

yummy. Definitely a favorite."





Referenced Links



   -



   Recipe Report

   <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mVR6C-x_UMmuY9lgn3VC0N-SdEnfhMcwM2eX9sMpse0/edit?gid=965641887#gid=965641887>

   -



   Recipe Score Dashboard

   <https://tableau.hellofresh.io/#/workbooks/13325/views>

   -



   Weekly Sentiment Dashboard

   <https://tableau.hellofresh.io/#/workbooks/8937/views> & Trend Dashboard

   <https://tableau.hellofresh.io/#/views/SentimentTrendAnalysisNEWDraft/SentimentTrends?:iid=1>

   -



   US Product & Monetization Metrics

   <https://tableau.hellofresh.io/#/workbooks/7980/views>







-- 



*RACHEL LEMIER*



Manager, Consumer & Product Insights



--

### EMAIL: Notes: ‚ÄúConnect on CA B2B Shopify Integration‚Äù Dec 15, 2025
ID: 19b22e9ea0ea3178
From: Gemini <gemini-notes@google.com>
----------------------------------------

Notes from ‚ÄúConnect on CA B2B Shopify Integration‚Äù



These notes have been sent to invited guests in your organization.



Open meeting notes



The content was auto-generated on December 15, 2025, 5:47 PM CET and may  

contain errors.





Summary



Elysa Viti initiated a discussion with Nikita Gorshkov about the Canadian  

B2B site, which requires Shopify as middleware because no current systems,  

except Katana, support the necessary B2B functionality out of the box; the  

site aims to automate small business employee orders (Factor only), which  

are currently manual and error-prone. Nikita Gorshkov emphasized that the  

success of B2B depends on a strong sales presence, and confirmed that zero  

people are currently allocated to B2B development, with expectations that a  

dedicated B2B team may be pushed for around June, leading Elysa Viti to  

estimate a Q3 launch for the Shopify integration. The strategy for the  

first half of the year involves manually testing streams like sports teams  

and gyms, and Elysa Viti suggested a separate team should handle B2B.





Suggested next steps





Elysa Viti will talk to Kieran and have him send over his business case so  

that she can tweak it for Canada.



Elysa Viti will forward all meeting notes over to Kevin and Cole for them  

to read up on and will keep Nikita Gorshkov posted on any questions.





Meeting records Document Notes by Gemini

### EMAIL: Notes: ‚ÄúJenna:Nikita 1:1‚Äù Dec 15, 2025
ID: 19b22d004c686bb6
From: Gemini <gemini-notes@google.com>
----------------------------------------

Notes from ‚ÄúJenna:Nikita 1:1‚Äù



These notes have been sent to invited guests in your organization.



Open meeting notes



The content was auto-generated on December 15, 2025, 5:18 PM CET and may  

contain errors.





Summary



Jenna O'Shea and Nikita Gorshkov discussed the immediate need to hire a  

mid-level designer for the Good Chop replacement position, with Jenna  

O'Shea preferring a mid-level role for long-term growth and Nikita Gorshkov  

emphasizing the candidate's need to be systematic. Regarding team  

management, Jenna O'Shea committed to being more hands-on and coaching Mega  

on stakeholder management, while they also decided to bundle design  

critiques for New Ventures and Shopping to promote knowledge transfer and  

suggested involving Nikita Gorshkov or Daniel in the hiring interviews.  

They also discussed Nikita Gorshkov's concern over the VMS Shopify store's  

templated design and "lack of ownership," and established the Factor Form  

strategy of integrating it into Factor if the Shopify store fails.





Suggested next steps





Jenna O'Shea will refine the New Brand's Jira board with sprint goals for  

designers by January 5th.



Jenna O'Shea will look for opportunities to open the position for 'good  

chop' sooner than January.



Nikita Gorshkov will ping Shay to connect with Jenna O'Shea for a demo to  

address UX issues for the factor forum subbrands.



Jenna O'Shea will put Yumi and Michael into a conversation to close the  

loop on the UX audit for factor form.



Jenna O'Shea will look into other rooms that she's supposed to be in.



The group will bundle the design critiques for new ventures and shopping  

together.





Meeting records Document Notes by Gemini

### EMAIL: Google is on a roll
ID: 19b22c8be8e13cfc
From: Mindstream <hello@mindstream.news>
----------------------------------------

----------

Straight lines? Yeah, those don‚Äôt exist.



Zoom in far enough on literally anything, a ruler, a road, even a laser beam, and it all falls apart into tiny curves and wobbles.



The universe is basically freelancing its geometry.



**What‚Äôs in store:**



* **Google‚Äôs **response to GPT 5.2?



* **This AI partnership **could reshape British science.



* **Mindstream Picks: **Amazon pulls its faulty AI recap for Fallout.



_Read Time: 5 minutes_





--------------------

###### **GOOGLE**



## [This is what agentic AI actually looks like](https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/11/google-launched-its-deepest-ai-research-agent-yet-on-the-same-day-openai-dropped-gpt-5-2/)



View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/b242c32d-1abc-423e-a3d4-e02845132ed1/mindstreammg_Create_a_digital_illustration_in_a_clean_modern__e97ca241-988f-4ead-84ca-4a0dc396ddcf_1.png?t=1765749690)

Follow image link: (https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/11/google-launched-its-deepest-ai-research-agent-yet-on-the-same-day-openai-dropped-gpt-5-2/)

Caption: 



Google has [introduced](https://techcrunch.com/2025/12/11/google-launched-its-deepest-ai-research-agent-yet-on-the-same-day-openai-dropped-gpt-5-2/) the Interactions API, a new way for developers to work with Gemini models (such as Gemini 3 Pro) and agents like Gemini Deep Research. 



It‚Äôs now available in public beta through Google AI Studio.



The API is design



s the ultimate LLM power move?‚Äù**



**Using em dashes even you begged it not to. - 38% **‚úÖ



Correcting mistakes it also originally made. - 33% 



Giving 5 examples when you asked for 1. - 20% 



Other - tell us! - 9%



**Your Views:**



_‚ÄúUsing AI Wrapper with Custom Prompts, that help prevent the first three in this survey. Well that is until the LLM updates and you have to fine tune your Custom Prompts again.‚Äù _- _**dube**_



_‚ÄúSometimes it gives me 10 examples but i‚Äôm not complaining lol‚Äù -_**_ wduqd_**



_‚ÄúThe em dashes drive me absolutely crazy!!!‚Äù _**_- uqtegd_**



Submit your opinions in our polls to be featured!





----------**Riddle Me This Answer: **_a cold._** **



**#929.**

Back in Black.

### EMAIL: Notes: ‚ÄúNikita / Mario‚Äù Dec 15, 2025
ID: 19b226d47d8e98ff
From: Gemini <gemini-notes@google.com>
----------------------------------------

Notes from ‚ÄúNikita / Mario‚Äù



These notes have been sent to invited guests in your organization.



Open meeting notes



The content was auto-generated on December 15, 2025, 3:31 PM CET and may  

contain errors.





Summary



Mario Konschake and Nikita Gorshkov discussed the definition and rollout of  

the AI-native Product Development Lifecycle (PDLC), with Mario Konschake  

expressing concern that product management will become a bottleneck as  

engineering and UX speed up without proper support for providing fast and  

better context. Nikita Gorshkov introduced their concept of context-driven  

product management, detailing a custom automated system that curates a  

knowledge base of entities and relationships to improve generative AI  

output, but raised concerns about scaling this approach due to the lack of  

consolidated infrastructure and the "nightmare" of locating the correct  

version of institutional knowledge across disparate tools. The participants  

compared AI models, with Nikita Gorshkov preferring Gemini over Claude for  

general text and deep research, and they agreed that high-value AI  

capabilities for product managers lie in data discovery and  

analysis‚Äîspecifically, using CLI tools to quickly analyze data and identify  

optimization opportunities.





Suggested next steps





Nikita Gorshkov will update the context-driven product management documents  

to include how to automate processes using cloud code and share it with PMs.



Mario Konschake will provide a document with requirements to security to  

set something up for Slack access.



The group will focus on engineers when it comes to actually building things  

for GenAI enablement.





Meeting records Document Notes by Gemini





Is the summary section in this email helpful?

Google LLC, 1600 Ampitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA

3,Tamir Arnesty,Factor Form,This is a backfill for Tamir in the Factor Form squad who left in Oct and will be replaced with a CS4 FE dev. Since this whole squad is in Canada we will hire in Toronto. Active interviewing is ongoing but the role has been open a few months due to 2 candidates rejecting offers at the final stage,8191,Live,Replacement,,P324194,[TECH-CA] Software Developer [TAM],CA - Ontario - 110 Spadina,4,4 - Mid Level,Software Engineer,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

4,Brian Leach,Factor Form,"This is a backfill for Brian Leach in the Factor Form squad who left in Aug (due to US RTO policy) and will be replaced with a CS6 Staff Engineer focused on FE. Since this whole squad is in Canada we will hire in Toronto. Active interviewing is ongoing with us not uet finding the ideal candidate that has experience across web, Shopify and RN development",8191,Live,Replacement,,P157684,[TECH-CA] Staff Engineer - Frontend [TAM],CA - Ontario - 110 Spadina,6,6 - Expert Level / Team Lead,Staff Engineer L6,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

5,Troy Edwards,The Pets Table,"Although this is a net new product role, we technically repurposed the backfill/PID of an intern we had for NV for 3 months, Troy Edwards. This role product is critical due to the increased scope, context switching and team size that the TPT will see in 2026. This position has already been filled with Prateek Jajoo who starts in December",8191,Filled - Prateek Jajoo,Replacement,,P-3716758,[TECH] Staff Product Manager [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,7,"7 - Associate Director, Head of",Staff Product Manager,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

5,Simon Yates,Good Chop,"Although we are using the backfill of Simon Yates, a CS7 Sr. SE based in Canada, we are moving this role to a CS5 FE role based in DE supporting the GoodChop squad due to limited capacity with members on mat leave to deliver the long-term roadmap. We already have an internal transfer aligned from the Growth Alliance for Chiamaka Glory Nwolisa to fill this role starting Dec. We also think she is within 12 months of the SE promotion so we will aim for her to for her to fill the SE role in this squad long term",8191,Filled - Chiamaka,Replacement,,P324438,[TECH-CA] Senior Staff Engineer [TAM],CA - Ontario - 110 Spadina,7,"7 - Associate Director, Head of",Staff Engineer L7,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

4,Andre Protti,Market Innovation & Optimization,"This role is to backfill Andrei Protti, a CS4 BE role who will be placed inside MIO squad to support the BE side of initiatives. Opening this role was delayed since we initiaitlly tried to fill this in termporarily with a BE contractor role from Gri Dynamics, but no suitable candidates were found for 2 months, so we aligned on skipping this and just opening the role longer term ",8191,Live,Replacement,,P324438,[TECH] Backend Software Engineer [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,4,4 - Mid Level,Software Engineer,SE Tech New Ventures - Engineering

1,Morteza Pourkazemi,Market Innovation & Optimization,This role is a CS5 BE backfill for Morteza who has been moved to Customer Profile Squad under Shopping Experience Tribe and will transition full time to



ontent and lifestyle strategy for the brand.",,Pending,Replacement,,,[TECH] Senior Product Manager [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,5,5 - Experienced level,Senior Product Manager,SE Tech New Ventures - General

4,Marina Guthmann,Good Chop,"Marina will be exiting HF, so we need a design subsctitute for Marina as soon as possible for the Good Chop team to continue executing at the velocitry we're looking for. ",,Pending,Replacement,,,[TECH] Senior Product Designer,DE - Berlin - Headquarters,6,6 - Expert Level / Team Lead,Senior Product Designer,SE Techg UX Design - General

4,,Good Chop,"This is a net new CS5 BE Developer role aligned with Yury Trofimov (VP Good Chop) and verbally approved by Dominik already which should be funded by the Good Chop PNL. With Good Chop MD expected to fund all engineering efforts across the brand, we can no longer rely on shared BE resources to deliver Good Chop initaitives so we want a designated BE role in this squad to support long-term Good Chop initaitves, mostly using the ""Away Model"" in other services.  The goal is to have this role filled by the end of January 2026 due to a backlog of BE initiaitves that need to be delivered for Good Chop early 2026.",8191,Pending,New,,,[TECH] Senior Backend Software Engineer [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,5,5 - Experienced level,Senior Software Engineer,SE Tech New Ventures - Engineering
